Household chores and environment.unrelated_pddl:
(define (problem travel-day-plan)
  (:domain travel-itinerary)
  (:objects
    traveler1 - person
    ticket1 - ticket
    gateA - gate
    hotel1 - lodging
  )
  (:init
    (at-person traveler1 city-center)
    (has-ticket traveler1 ticket1)
    (gate-for ticket1 gateA)
    (hotel-available hotel1)
  )
  (:goal (and (checked-in traveler1) (at-hotel traveler1 hotel1)))
)
Household chores and environment.unrelated_plan:
(go-to traveler1 city-center gateA)
(check-in traveler1 ticket1 gateA)
(board traveler1 ticket1 gateA)
(transfer traveler1 airport hotel1)
Household chores and environment.unrelated_demand_context:
Demand: Please check me in for my flight and make sure I reach the hotel tonight.
Context: The traveler is downtown with a confirmed ticket, the gate is at the airport, and a hotel room is available across town.
